movies.title: Delete My Love
movies.plot: A young man named So Boring is very unlucky in both his professional and personal lives. He discovers a way to delete unpleasant people from his life and substitute them with nice people. His dream life seems to have come true, with nice family, friends and colleagues around him. However, he discovers what he truly wants in his life along the process, and he learns an important lesson in his life .
movies.simplePlot: A young man named So Boring gains the ability to delete people in his life and substitute them with nice people.

biography.bio: J. Arie was born on November 4, 1989 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony as Rachel Lui Sam-Yu. She is an actress, known for Get Outta Here (2015), She Remembers, He Forgets (2015) and Lou Lap (2015).
biography.name: J. Arie

biography.bio: Jacquelin Ch'ng was born on May 1, 1980 in Malaysia. She is an actress, known for Fun chin see oi (2010), S for Sex, S for Secrets (2014) and A Secret Between Us (2013).
biography.name: Jacquelin Ch'ng

biography.bio: Julian Cheung was born on August 27, 1971 in Hong Kong. He is an actor, known for B gai waak (1998), Bong ga (2007) and Chuet sik san tau (2001). He is married to Anita Yuen. They have one child.
biography.name: Julian Cheung

biography.bio: Justin Cheung is an actor and cinematographer, known for Due West: Our Sex Journey (2012), Yat yuk yat sai gai: Go dang fut siu mau gam yat gei (2015) and Sex and Zen: Extreme Ecstasy (2011).
biography.name: Justin Cheung

biography.bio: Babyjohn Choi was born on December 8, 1986 in Hong Kong as Hon-Yik Choi. He is an actor, known for Ip Man 3 (2015), The Way We Dance (2013) and Kill Zone 2 (2015).
biography.name: Babyjohn Choi

biography.bio: Erica Chui was born on June 4, 1987 in Hong Kong as Wing-Kwan Chui. She is an actress, known for The Man from Macau (2014), Delete My Love (2014) and Probation Order (2013).
biography.name: Erica Chui

biography.bio: Maria Cordero was born in 1954 in Macao, China. She is known for her work on Vagues invisibles (2006), City on Fire (1987) and Hoi sam gui miu ba (1989).
biography.name: Maria Cordero

biography.bio: Michael Hui was born in Guangzhou, China on September 3, 1942. He went to La Salle College, and then earned his degree in Sociology from the Chinese University of Hong Kong. He came to the Hong Kong entertainment industry running the comedic "Hui Brothers Show." Shortly afterward, in went into films in the early 1970s. He would often star with his brothers Ricky Hui and Samuel Hui in his comedies, usually movies about pitting their wits against the odds to earn instant money. Hui in these series of films was often referred to as "Mr. Boo" by the Japanese market. By the 1980s through the 1990s, Hui has continued acting and producing his own comedies, most of his movies being centered on the quest for wealth. His satirical comedies, deadpan delivery, character-driven storyline and his charming wit makes him one of the most popular actors and comedians in Hong Kong. In 2006, he became host of Hong Kong's version of "Deal or no Deal."
biography.name: Michael Hui

biography.bio: Jinny Ng was born on May 23, 1992 in Fuzhou, Fujian, China as Yeuk-Hei Ng. She is an actress, known for A Secret Between Us (2013), Golden Chickensss (2014) and Delete My Love (2014).
biography.name: Jinny Ng

biography.bio: Eliza Sam was born on November 17, 1984 in Vancouver, Canada. She is an actress, known for Lou biu, lei hou ye (2013), Delete My Love (2014) and Brick Slaves (2015).
biography.name: Eliza Sam

biography.bio: Cho-Lam Wong was born on January 9, 1980 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony. He is an actor and writer, known for Come on, Cousin (2014), Rise of the Legend (2014) and La comédie humaine (2010). He has been married to Leanne Lee since February 14, 2015.
biography.name: Cho-Lam Wong

biography.bio: Ivana Wong was born on June 18, 1980 in Hong Kong as Yuen-Chi Wong. She is an actress, known for Fun sau 100 chi (2014), Come on, Cousin (2014) and Lou biu, lei hou ye (2013). She has been married to Eric So since November 28, 2015.
biography.name: Ivana Wong

biography.bio: Michael Wong has managed to become a star of Asian cinema in Hong Kong despite not even speaking a word of Chinese Cantonese, and he had no training in martial arts; in Asia, the actor known for his starring role in action film Final Option (1994) and Fei hu (1996) where he plays a cop; for First Option the actor was nominated at the Hong Kong Film Awards, the Oscar of Hong Kong cinema, and later starred in a myriad of productions and movies oriental, often unpublished in the the West such as Yeshou xingjing (1998)_, which is considered one of the most successful films of Hong Kong cinema; actor took part but also in many U.S. films such as Niki Larson (1993) starring opposite Jackie Chan,Piège à Hong Kong (1998) with 'Jean Claude Van Damme', and the film Cold War (2012), and soon we will see the actor in the italian film The Mercury Conspiracy (2013) with Luca Barbareschi.
biography.name: Michael Wong

biography.bio: Fung Woo was born on January 18, 1932 in Guangzhou, Guangdong, Republic of China as Wu Kai-sau. He is an actor and director, known for Police Story (1985), Les associés (1991) and Overheard 2 (2011). He was previously married to Wing-Ho Lui.
biography.name: Fung Woo

biography.bio: Ava Yu is an actress, known for Chut sui fu yung (2010), Confession of Pain (2006) and Murderer (2009).
biography.name: Ava Yu
